label_patches.new: {demo?.user.tier ? VERIFICATION_TIERS[demo.user.tier.toLowerCase() as keyof typeof VERIFICATION_TIERS].label : stats?.verificationLevel ? VERIFICATION_TIERS[stats.verificationLevel.toLowerCase() as keyof typeof VERIFICATION_TIERS].label : VERIFICATION_TIERS.basic.label}
title: NOTIFICATIONS[n.type as keyof typeof NOTIFICATIONS]?.title ?? n.title,

top_copy_improvements: Centralize all module and navigation labels in `client/src/lib/copy.ts` to ensure consistent terminology across the platform, especially for the 6 core modules.
Strictly enforce 'Verification Tier' (Basic/Enhanced/Institutional) across all user-facing text, replacing generic 'tier' or 'level' references.
Ensure 'Lifetime Attribution' is used explicitly wherever the concept of compounding relationship value or permanent credit is discussed.
Align all 'matching' references with 'Blind Matching' or 'Intent' to highlight ANAVI's unique, confidential matching mechanism.
Consistently use 'Escrow Milestone' instead of just 'milestone' or 'escrow' when referring to the deal progression and fund release mechanism.
